tagline: Slides, code, and supplemental materials for the LiveLesson: Working with Big Data: Infrastructure, Algorithms, and Visualizations
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### Working with Big Data: Infrastructure, Algorithms, and Visualizations
This site goes with the Addison Wesley LiveLesson Working with Big Data: Infrastructure, Algorithms, and Visualizations available on [Safari Online](http://safaribooksonline.com)

### Authors and Contributors
Paul Dix (@pauldix)

### Discussion
Ask questions about the lectures, or about anything big data related on in the [Working with Big Data Group](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/working-with-big-data).
name: Working-with-big-data
